named-query.name: Hospitalization.findAllHospitalizationBeanByOperationDate
named-query.query: SELECT new ua.nike.project.hibernate.model.HospitalizationBean( op.operationDate.id, hp.id, hp.numberOfPlace, p.id, p.surname, p.firstName, p.secondName, p.sex, p.status, op.id, op.numberOfOrder, pr.id, pr.name, op.eye, op.timeForCome, op.surgeon, op.manager, op.note ) FROM Operation op INNER JOIN op.operationDate ods INNER JOIN op.patient p LEFT JOIN op.procedure pr INNER JOIN op.hospitalization hp WHERE op.operationDate.date = :operationDate and hp.operationDate.id = op.operationDate.id and op.hospitalization is not null ORDER BY hp.numberOfPlace

named-query.name: Hospitalization.findAllNotHospitalizationBeanByOperationDate
named-query.query: SELECT new ua.nike.project.hibernate.model.HospitalizationBean( op.operationDate.id, hp.id, hp.numberOfPlace, p.id, p.surname, p.firstName, p.secondName, p.sex, p.status, op.id, op.numberOfOrder, pr.id, pr.name, op.eye, op.timeForCome, op.surgeon, op.manager, op.note ) FROM Operation op INNER JOIN op.operationDate ods INNER JOIN op.patient p LEFT JOIN op.procedure pr LEFT JOIN op.hospitalization hp WHERE op.operationDate.date = :operationDate and op.hospitalization is null ORDER BY hp.numberOfPlace
